name: 2022 Asia Conference on Knowledge and Innovation Management
content: PUBLICATION OPTIONS: Accepted papers after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published into ACMLC 2022 conference proceedings as a workshop by IEEE CPS, which will be included into IEEE Xplore and submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, etc for indexing. A few extended papers from the conference will be recommended to the International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology for publicaiton after review, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
